page.title: 09Hatton 2
page.content: {Edderty Farm}was a farm of its own at one time.In 1872 there were two cottages and a farmstead.Now it is abandond and is part of Hatton Farm. Mr.Stewart grows turnips and makes silage to help with the winter feeding.His barley crop is sold to the {Whisky Maltings}in Arbroath.Potatoes are a small part of his crop and they are also used for feeding the animals in winter. He has tractors trailers,a plough,a Land Rover,a combine harvester,a fertiliser spreader,a forklift,a bailer and others for cultivating the land. Steven Graham Primary 6.
